com.metreeca.rest.handlers

Class Creator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Delegator
      • com.metreeca.rest.handlers.Creator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler

    public final class Creator
extends Delegator
    LDP resource creator.

    Handles creation requests on the linked data container identified by the request focus item, according to the following operating modes.

    If the request target is a container and the request includes a resource shape:

    • the shape is redacted taking into account request user roles, Form.create task, Form.convey mode and Form.detail view;
    • the request RDF body is expected to contain an RDF description of the resource to be created matched by the redacted shape; statements outside this envelope are reported with a Response.UnprocessableEntity status code and a structured trace element.

    Otherwise, If the request target is a container:

    • the request RDF body is expected to contain a symmetric concise bounded description of the resource to be created; statements outside this envelope are reported with a Response.UnprocessableEntity status code and a structured trace element;

    Otherwise:

    • the request is reported with a Response.NotImplemented status code.

    Regardless of the operating mode, the request RDF body is expected to describe the resource to be created using the request focus item as subject.

    On successful body validation:

    • the resource to be created is assigned a unique IRI based on the stem of the stem of the request IRI and a name generated by either the default UUID-based or a custom-provided slug generator;
    • the request RDF body is rewritten to the assigned IRI and stored into the system storage engine;
    • the target container identified by the request focus item is connected to the newly created resource as required by the LDP container profile identified by rdf:type and LDP properties in the request shape.

    On successful resource creation, the IRI of the newly created resource is advertised through the Location HTTP response header.

    See Also:
    CBD - Concise Bounded Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • Creator

        public Creator()
        Creates a resource creator with a UUID slug generator.

      • Creator

        public Creator(BiFunction<Request,Model,String> slug)
        Creates a resource creator.
        Parameters:
        slug - a function mapping from the creation request and its RDF payload to the name to be assigned to the newly created resource; must return a non-null and non-empty value; names clashing with existing resources are reported with a Response.Conflict status code and a structured trace element
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if slug is null

    • Method Detail

      • uuid

        public static BiFunction<Request,Model,String> uuid()
        Creates a random UUID-based slug generator.
        Returns:
        a slug generator returning a new random UUID for each call
